caption:
“Worship with your footsteps.”

Reflection:
Every step can be a song of praise. Movement itself becomes prayer when guided by love.

Commentary:
This reflection transforms walking into worship — a reminder that devotion is not confined to temples but lived through daily action.

#VeniPublishing #VeniFaithful #ModernPilgrim #PrayerInPublic #PilgrimHeart #CitySaints #FaithInMotion #FaithOverFear #JesusChrist
